name: ShootGame
description:
Hi my name is Nicola alias Nok, i'm begin to study Unity and Programming and design from about 4 years, i  live in Florence Italy and i'm looking for a job in this beautiful Game Dev World.

I did this project "ShootGame" for learn to programming in Unity, i know is not a beautiful game graphich, design, script, for this i share with you free this project.

Donation is appreciated, but  is not a must!..

Is easy 2 Game mode  Survival : kill every object for make more points next some points the game begin to be more fast, if balloon touch the spike you loose life. Every 100 points you earn 1 life more. Be te best "i did max 150 points" 

Battle : you must disable the shield, for do this you must kill TNT balloon and every 4 tube disable, Ralph shield go off and he take damage. more Wall ballon you kill more damager you do.

!!be care every shield off Reset  the count of Baloon wall!!!!! 

you loose life only if TNT baloon go up in the tube ! so kill all TNT baloon.
